name: Mirabilia
description:
College life was not supposed to be this stressful. That's what Sheridan Wayne Householder thought. True, studying criminal justice was no laughing matter. Then he finds out he's awakened the ghost of an evil ancestor who is bent on continuing his ways.

--

Mirabilia is an original short story in kinetic novel format written by Red Lily.

--

Credits
  • Art, story, and programming - Red Lily
  • Main theme - "The Voices" by Kevin Macleod
  • Stock photography from Freepik.com
